param.name: random_seed
param.description: Control the random seed persistence 0 - use time(NULL) as a seed for random number generator 1 - read state from file "random_seed" or use seed=time(NULL) if file not found other values - use given number as the seed for the generator

param.name: number_of_events
param.description: The number of equally weighted events to be saved

param.name: number_of_test_events
param.description: The number of events used to calculate the cross sections

param.name: save_test_events
param.description: 0 - test events are not stored (default) 1 - test events are finalized and stored in weighted.eventsout.root avg(weight)=total cross section 2 - test events of nonzero weight are finalized and stored in weighted.eventsout.root avg(weight)=total cross section

options.option: 1 - Make weighted events from all test events
2 - Make weighted events from non-zero test events

param.name: user_events
param.description: Enable axial mass analysis

condition.description: Fit axial mass to MiniBoone data

param.name: user_params
param.description: Parameters for the user defined analyser

param.name: beam_energy
param.description: beam particle energy in [MeV], (Monochromatics beam)

param.name: beam_particle
param.description: PDG code of the beam particles

param.name: beam_direction
param.description: x y z cordinates of the beam direction

param.name: beam_pot_per_file
param.description: Beam POT per file

param.name: geom_length_units
param.description: Length units used by geometry

param.name: geom_density_convert
param.description: Factor to convert geometry density units to g/cm3

param.name: beam_length_units
param.description: Length units used by beam

param.name: beam_inputroot
param.description: Path to input flux histogram file

param.name: beam_inputroot_flux
param.description: Name of total flux histogram file

param.name: beam_inputroot_nue
param.description: Histogram name for nue

param.name: beam_inputroot_nueb
param.description: Histogram name for nueb

param.name: beam_inputroot_numu
param.description: Histogram name for numu

param.name: beam_inputroot_numub
param.description: Histogram name for numub

param.name: beam_inputroot_nutau
param.description: Histogram name for nutau

param.name: beam_inputroot_nutaub
param.description: Histogram name for nutaub

param.name: nucleus_p
param.description: Number of protons

param.name: nucleus_n
param.description: Number of neutrons

param.name: nucleus_E_b
param.description: [MeV] binding energy

param.name: nucleus_kf
param.description: [MeV] Fermi momentum, used in Fermi gas model and in Pauli blocking

param.name: nucleus_target
param.description: Models for the description of nucleus as a target

options.option: deuterium with constant binding energy nucleus_E_b (for tests only!)

param.name: nucleus_model
param.description: Models for the description of nucleus

param.name: dyn_qel_cc
param.description: Quasi elastic charged current

param.name: dyn_qel_nc
param.description: Quasi elastic neutral current

param.name: dyn_res_cc
param.description: Resonant charged current

param.name: dyn_res_nc
param.description: Resonant neutral current

param.name: dyn_dis_cc
param.description: Deep inelastic charged current

param.name: dyn_dis_nc
param.description: Deep inelastic neutral current

param.name: dyn_coh_cc
param.description: Coherent charged current

param.name: dyn_coh_nc
param.description: Coherent neutral current

param.name: dyn_mec_cc
param.description: Meson exchange charged current

param.name: dyn_mec_nc
param.description: Meson exchange charged current

param.name: dyn_hyp_cc
param.description: Hyperon production charged current

param.name: dyn_e_el
param.description: Elastic electron scattering

param.name: dyn_e_spp
param.description: electron SPP

param.name: eel_theta_lab
param.description: Theta lab for eletron measurement

param.name: eel_dz
param.description: electon scattering cos_theta_lab accuracy

param.name: eel_alg
param.description: electron elastic scattering algorithm: old, fast, Mott, Rutheford

param.name: qel_kinematics
param.description: Quasi elastic kinematics

param.name: qel_vector_ff_set
param.description: electromagnetic Form factors

options.option: dipole, dipole electric form factor G_E^V
BBBA05, hep-ex/0602017 BBBA05 for Q2<18 GeV
BBA03, hep-ex/0308005 BBA-2003 for Q2<6 GeV

param.name: qel_rpa
param.description: Use rpa corretions of KG in qel cc events

param.name: qel_strange
param.description: use the strangenes in the axial ff

param.name: qel_strangeEM
param.description: [MeV]dont use the strangenes in the vector ff

param.name: delta_s
param.description: [Delta s parameter in the strange form factor

param.name: qel_cc_vector_mass
param.description: [MeV] vector mass

param.name: qel_cc_axial_mass
param.description: [MeV] axial mass

param.name: qel_nc_axial_mass
param.description: [MeV] axial mass

param.name: qel_s_axial_mass
param.description: [MeV] axial mass used in the strange dipole ff

param.name: flux_correction
param.description: no flux correction

param.name: sf_method
param.description: For certain nuclei (C12, O16, Ar40, Ca40, Fe56) it is possible to use the spectral function model instead of the Fermi gas model in the quasi ellastic events. For other nuclei the parameter is ignored.

options.option: use grid spectral function: (C12, O16, Ar40, Fe56)
use factorized spectral function: (O16, Ar40, Ca40)

param.name: sf_fsi
param.description: Turn on/off FSI for spectral function

param.name: sf_coulomb
param.description: Turn on/off Couloumb correction for spectral function

param.name: sf_pb
param.description: Pauli blocking model for SF.

options.option: TG approach - use MC method to decide about PB, according to a nucleon momentum distribution given by spectral function

param.name: cc_smoothing
param.description: A little performace gain in the QEL channel can be obtained by using: cc_smoothing=1

param.name: delta_FF_set
param.description: Dipole delta form factors

options.option: dipole with 2 parameters: pion_axial_mass and pion_C5A; Graczyk&JS preferred choices are: MA=0.94 and C5A=1.19
Eq.(13), L. Alvarez-Ruso, S. K. Singh, M. J. Vincente Vascas, Phys. Rev. C 57, (1998) 2693
taken from Bariquila-Cano.et al (chiral quark model)

param.name: e_spp_ff_set
param.description: Electromagnetic Delta form factors for electron scattering

options.option: SU(6) quark model-inspired (C4V=-M/W C3V, C5V=0) (KMG+JZ fit, unpublished)
SU(6) quark model-inspired + Pade correction (KMG+JZ fit, unpublished)

param.name: delta_selfenergy
param.description: E. Oset Nucl. Phys. A 468 Delta selfenergy for electron scattering

param.name: pion_axial_mass
param.description: in GeV units

param.name: delta_angular
param.description: Delta decay anisotropy

param.name: spp_precision
param.description: recommended value is 500, this controls the precision in RES-DIS boundary region

param.name: res_dis_cut
param.description: res dis boundary in MeV, should be 1600

param.name: bkgrscaling
param.description: scaling of non resonant backgroung; should be in the range -1.3...+1.3

param.name: coh_mass_correction
param.description: Rein Sehgal correction to CC coherent single pion production

param.name: coh_new
param.description: Use new, faster implementation of coherent events by CJ

param.name: coh_kind
param.description: Switch between Rein-Sehgal (1) and Berger Sehgal(2) models

param.name: mec_kind
param.description: MEC model

param.name: mec_central_motion
param.description: motion of correlated pairs, sigma in gaussian distribution

param.name: mec_back_to_back_smearing
param.description: smearing of originally back-to-back correlated pair nucleons momenta

param.name: mec_pb_trials
param.description: how many times configuration satisfying Pauli blocking is searched for

param.name: MEC_pauli_blocking
param.description: enable (1) or not (0) Pauli blocking of final nucleons in Nieves model

param.name: MEC_cm_direction
param.description: in CM frame prefered directions along (>0.0) or perpendicular (<0.0) wrt momentum transfer; | | cannot be larger than 1

param.name: hyp_lambda
param.description: Lambda baryon production

param.name: hyp_sigma_zero
param.description: Sigma zero baryon production

param.name: hyp_sigma_minus
param.description: Sigma minus baryon production

param.name: hyp_g2_Re_part
param.description: Real part of g2 form factor>

param.name: hyp_g2_Im_part
param.description: Imaginary part of g2 form factor>

param.name: hyp_su3_sym_breaking
param.description: SU(3) symmetry breaking coefficients from Phys. Rev. D 51, 2262 (1995) tables vii and viii>

param.name: hyp_axial_mass
param.description: Axial mass used in hyperon production>

param.name: hyp_effmass
param.description: Use hyperon effective mass if cross section

param.name: kaskada_on
param.description: use (1) or not (0) the cascade

param.name: kaskada_w
param.description: [MeV] work function

param.name: kaskada_redo
param.description: Only recalculate FSI for an existing eventsout.root

param.name: kaskada_writeall
param.description: Store all intermediate FSI particles int the event::all vector

param.name: formation_zone
param.description: Name of formation zone model

param.name: tau
param.description: parametr in the ranft fz model

param.name: formation_length
param.description: formation length in fm for formation_zone = const

param.name: first_step
param.description: [fm] length of the first step in cascade standalone run

param.name: step
param.description: [fm] length of one step in cascade

param.name: kaskada_NN_mfp_scale
param.description: Scale the mean free path for nucleons in the cascade

param.name: kaskada_NN_xsec
param.description: The model of the nucleon-nucleon cross sections in the cascade

options.option: Custom fit to C. Patrignani et al. (Particle Data Group), Chin.Phys. C40 (2016) 100001
J. Cugnon et al., Nucl.Instrum.Meth. B111 (1996) 215-220 & PDG 2016

param.name: kaskada_NN_inel
param.description: The model of the nucleon-nucleon inelastic coefficients in the cascade

options.option: Custom fit to C. Patrignani et al. (Particle Data Group), Chin.Phys. C40 (2016) 100001 & J. Bystricky et al., Journal de Physique 48 (1987) 1901-1924

param.name: kaskada_NN_angle
param.description: The model of the nucleon-nucleon angular distributions in the cascade

options.option: J. Cugnon et al., Nucl.Instrum.Meth. B111 (1996) 215-220

param.name: kaskada_NN_corr
param.description: Effective nucleon density corrections

options.option: Nucleon correlations as described in arXiv:1902.05618

param.name: kaskada_piN_xsec
param.description: The model of the pion-nucleon cross sections in the cascade

param.name: pauli_blocking
param.description: enable (1) or not (0) Pauli blocking

param.name: mixed_order
param.description: random order of events in uotut file

param.name: hyp_Lambda_Eb
param.description: Lambda binding energy at max density

param.name: hyp_Sigma_Eb
param.description: Sigma binding energy at max density
